channel.title: Small Changes to Forums
channel.description:
We've made a small change (long overdue) to the Forums, setting up a distinct channel for Gauntlet Publishing. This will be the place to discuss all Gauntlet Publishing games and releases: The Between, Brindlewood Bay, Trophy, Codex, etc. We'll make sure to announce new things (like new issues of Codex) here.
You may notice some old topics popping up in the recent topics list; that's because we moved a number of threads over there. We have a few other small clean up changes coming (like some better pinned messages with easier contact info). .

item.title: Small Changes to Forums
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
